fix(deploy): fix production database and trigger final deployment

PRODUCTION database (ma_saas_platform) now at head: dc2c0f69c1b1
Pre-Deploy Command configured: cd backend && alembic upgrade head

This should succeed!

fix(deploy): correct Pre-Deploy Command to include backend/ directory

**ROOT CAUSE IDENTIFIED:**
Pre-Deploy Command was running from project root, but alembic needs backend/ directory.

**FIX APPLIED:**
Changed Pre-Deploy Command from:
  'alembic upgrade head'
To:
  'cd backend && alembic upgrade head'

**EXPECTED OUTCOME:**
- Migrations will now run from correct directory
- alembic will find alembic.ini and migrations/
- Database schema will be updated before service starts
- Health checks should pass
- Deployment status should be 'live'

This should resolve all deployment failures.
chore: add deployment trigger script and CreateDealModal updates
